{"step_by_step_thinking": "As we move from anterior to posterior, the gingival embrasure refers to the triangular space between the interdental papilla and the facial or lingual gingival margin. In general, the size of the gingival embrasure tends to increase as we move from anterior to posterior teeth. This is because the size of the teeth and the interdental spaces typically increase from anterior to posterior. Therefore, the correct answer is B. Larger.", "answer_choice": "B"}
